sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2023-08-09 18:12:46.265907 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2023-08-09T21:06:35.504079-04:00.

body.ab: <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C11"/><lb n="c56-0057__Pt2__main__1"/> <milestone spanTo="#c56-0057.02" unit="tei:head"/> <sga-add place="interlinear" sID="c56-0057__Pt2__main__d5e11742"/> Ch V– 113 <sga-add eID="c56-0057__Pt2__main__d5e11742"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0057.02"/><milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0057__Pt2__main__2"/>Hethen put the following letter <lb n="c56-0057__Pt2__main__3"/>into my hands. <lb n="c56-0057__Pt2__main__4"/>"To V. Frankenstien <lb n="c56-0057__Pt2__main__5"/>Geneva <mod sID="c56-0057__Pt2__main__d5e11758"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0057__Pt2__main__d5e11760">Apri</del> <mdel>l</mdel> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0057__Pt2__main__d5e11765"/>March <sga-add eID="c56-0057__Pt2__main__d5e11765"/><mod eID="c56-0057__Pt2__main__d5e11758"/> 18 <shi rend="underline"></shi> 17— <lb n="c56-0057__Pt2__main__6"/>"My dear Cousin<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0057__Pt2__main__7"/>"I cannot describe to you the <w ana="start"/>uneasi<lb n="c56-0058__main__1"/>ness<w ana="end"/> we have all felt concerning your <lb n="c56-0058__main__2"/>health. We cannot help imagining that <lb n="c56-0058__main__3"/>your friend Clerval conceals the <w ana="start"/>ex<lb n="c56-0058__main__4"/>tent<w ana="end"/> of your disorder, for it is now <lb n="c56-0058__main__5"/>several months since we have seen <lb n="c56-0058__main__6"/>your handwriting and all this time <lb n="c56-0058__main__7"/>you have been obliged to dictate to <lb n="c56-0058__main__8"/>Henry – Surely Victor you must have <lb n="c56-0058__main__9"/>been very ill <mod sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11820"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11822"/>and this makes us very wretched as much so <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0058.01">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0058__left_margin__1"/>nearly as <mdel>t</mdel> <lb n="c56-0058__left_margin__2"/>after the death <lb n="c56-0058__left_margin__3"/>of your dear <lb n="c56-0058__left_margin__4"/>mother <anchor xml:id="c56-0058.05"/><sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11822"/><mod eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11820"/> .My father was almost <lb n="c56-0058__main__10"/>persuaded <mod sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11849"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11851">of this</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11854"/>that you were indeed dangerously ill, <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11854"/><mod eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11849"/> and could hardly <lb n="c56-0058__main__11"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11861"/>be <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11861"/> re <mod sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11864"/> <mdel>f</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11868"/>st <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11868"/><mod eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11864"/> rain <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11872"/>ed <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11872"/>from <mod place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11883"/>undertaking<sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11883"/><mod eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11875"/>a journey to Ingolstadt. <lb n="c56-0058__main__12"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11889">I</del> <del next="#c56-0058.02" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11893">but I entreated him not</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11896"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11898"/>to undertake it <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11898"/> </del> <del next="#c56-0058.03" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11902">because</del> <mod sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11905"/> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11907"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11907"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11913"> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11915"/>for <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11915"/> </del> <mod eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11905"/> <lb n="c56-0058__main__13"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11922">although</del> <delSpan rend="vertical_line" spanTo="#c56-0058.04"/>his health is better now <lb n="c56-0058__main__14"/>tha <mod sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11930"/> <mdel>t</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11934"/>n <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11934"/> <mod eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11930"/> it has been since the death <lb n="c56-0058__main__15"/>of My beloved Aunt, yet <mod sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11940"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11942">tha</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11945"/>the <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11945"/> <mod eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11940"/> fatigue <lb n="c56-0058__main__16"/>might <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11952"/>have <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11952"/> <anchor xml:id="c56-0058.04"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11957">make him very ill</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11960">and</del><lb n="c56-0058__main__17"/>Clerval always wr <mod sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11965"/> <mdel>o</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11969"/>i <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11969"/><mod eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11965"/> te <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11974"/>s <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11974"/>that you <lb n="c56-0058__main__18"/>weregetting better <mod sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11979"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11981">and</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11984"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11984"/> <mdel>I</mdel><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e11992"/>I <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e11994">arden</del> eagerly<sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11992"/><mod eID="c56-0058__main__d5e11979"/>hope you <lb n="c56-0058__main__19"/>will confirm this <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e12001"/>intelligence <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e12001"/>soon in your own <lb n="c56-0058__main__20"/>handwriting for indeed, indeed Victor <lb n="c56-0058__main__21"/>we are all very <mod sID="c56-0058__main__d5e12009"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e12011">uneasy</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e12014"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e12014"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e12020"/>miserable on this account <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e12020"/><mod eID="c56-0058__main__d5e12009"/> . Relieve <lb n="c56-0058__main__22"/>us from this fear and we shall <lb n="c56-0058__main__23"/>be the happiest creatures in the <lb n="c56-0058__main__24"/>world.– My uncleshealth <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e12030">impro</del> is <lb n="c56-0058__main__25"/>now <mod sID="c56-0058__main__d5e12036"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e12038">well &</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e12041"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e12043"/> <unclear>far</unclear> <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e12043"/> </del> <mod eID="c56-0058__main__d5e12036"/> vigorous that he appears <lb n="c56-0058__main__26"/>ten years younger since last <lb n="c56-0058__main__27"/>winter. Ernest also is so much <w ana="start"/>im<lb n="c56-0058__main__28"/>proved<w ana="end"/>, <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e12061"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0058__main__d5e12063"/>so <sga-add eID="c56-0058__main__d5e12063"/> </del> thatyou would hardly <lb n="c56-0058__main__29"/>know him; he is now nearly sixteen <lb n="c56-0058__main__30"/>you know and has <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0058__main__d5e12071">quite</del> lost that<lb n="c56-0059__main__1"/>sickly appearance that he had <lb n="c56-0059__main__2"/>some years ago –he is quite well & <shi rend="underline">hearty</shi> <lb n="c56-0059__main__3"/>if I <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12091">y</del> may use that term for it is <lb n="c56-0059__main__4"/>very expressive. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0059__main__5"/>"My uncle and I conversed <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12101">the</del> <lb n="c56-0059__main__6"/>last night a long time about what <lb n="c56-0059__main__7"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0059.01"/><lb n="c56-0059__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0059__left_margin__d5e12115"/>profession <sga-add eID="c56-0059__left_margin__d5e12115"/>Ernest <mod sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12118"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12120"> <shi rend="underline">should be</shi> </del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12126"/>should follow <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12126"/><mod eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12118"/> . His constant <lb n="c56-0059__main__8"/>ill health when young has deprived <lb n="c56-0059__main__9"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0059.02"/><lb n="c56-0059__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0059__left_margin__d5e12141"/>him <sga-add eID="c56-0059__left_margin__d5e12141"/>of the habit of application andnow <lb n="c56-0059__main__10"/>that he enjoys good health <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12146">we</del> he <lb n="c56-0059__main__11"/>is continuallyin the open air <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12151">on</del><lb n="c56-0059__main__12"/>climbing the hillsor rowing on the <lb n="c56-0059__main__13"/>lake. I, therefore, proposed that <lb n="c56-0059__main__14"/>he should <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12161"/>be <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12161"/>a farmer which you <lb n="c56-0059__main__15"/>know cousin is a favourite scheme <lb n="c56-0059__main__16"/>of mine –A farmer's is a very healthy <lb n="c56-0059__main__17"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12171">&</del> happy life; and the least hurtful <lb n="c56-0059__main__18"/>or rather the most benificial <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12176">of any</del> <lb n="c56-0059__main__19"/>profession. <mod sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12181"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12183"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12183"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12189"/>of any. <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12189"/><mod eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12181"/>My <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12193">father</del> uncle had an <lb n="c56-0059__main__20"/>idea of his being <mod sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12199"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12201"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12201"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12207"/>educated as <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12207"/><mod eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12199"/>an advocate, <mod sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12211"/> <mdel>&</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12215"/>that <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12215"/><mod eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12211"/>through <lb n="c56-0059__main__21"/>his interrest <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12221"/>he might become <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12221"/>a judge. But besides that <lb n="c56-0059__main__22"/>he is not at all fit for such an <lb n="c56-0059__main__23"/>occupation, it is certainly <mod sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12229"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12231">better</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12234"/>more <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12236">honourable</del> <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12234"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="sublinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12240"/>creditable <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12240"/><mod eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12229"/>to <lb n="c56-0059__main__24"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12246">to</del> cultivate the earth for the <w ana="start"/>suste<lb n="c56-0059__main__25"/>nance<w ana="end"/> of man than <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12256">it</del> to be the <lb n="c56-0059__main__26"/>confid <mod sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12261"/> <mdel/> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12268"/>a <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12268"/><mod eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12261"/> nt & sometimes <mod sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12272"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12274">a helpmate</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12277"/>the accomplice <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12277"/><mod eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12272"/> of <lb n="c56-0059__main__27"/><mod sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12284"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12286">their</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12289"/>his <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12289"/><mod eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12284"/>vices; which is the employment <mod sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12293"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12295"/> <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0059.03">^</metamark> <lb n="c56-0059__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c56-0059__left_margin__d5e12304"/>&<sga-add eID="c56-0059__left_margin__d5e12304"/><sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12295"/><mod eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12293"/><lb n="c56-0059__main__28"/>of a Lawyer. <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0059.05"/>And if he should become <lb n="c56-0059__main__29"/>a judge <anchor xml:id="c56-0059.05"/> I said that <mod sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12321"/> <mdel>a</mdel> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0059__main__d5e12325">rich</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0059__main__d5e12328"/>the occupation of a prosperous <sga-add eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12328"/><mod eID="c56-0059__main__d5e12321"/> farmer <lb n="c56-0059__main__30"/>if it were not a more honourable<lb n="c56-0060__main__1"/>it was at least a happier employ <lb n="c56-0060__main__2"/>ment than that of a judge, whose <lb n="c56-0060__main__3"/>misfortune it was always to meddle <lb n="c56-0060__main__4"/>with the dark side of human nature <lb n="c56-0060__main__5"/>My uncle smiled and said that I <lb n="c56-0060__main__6"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12355">ou <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12357"/>g <sga-add eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12357"/>t</del> ought to be an advocate myself; <lb n="c56-0060__main__7"/>which put an end to the conversation <lb n="c56-0060__main__8"/>on that subject <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0060__main__9"/>And now I must tell you a little <lb n="c56-0060__main__10"/>story that will please you. Do you <lb n="c56-0060__main__11"/>not remember <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12374">Ju</del> Justine <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12377">Martin</del> ? <anchor xml:id="c56-0060.01"/><lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12386"/><sga-add eID="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12386"/>Moritz?<lb n="c56-0060__main__12"/>Perhapsyou do notI will therefore <lb n="c56-0060__main__13"/>tell youher storyin a few words. Mad. <lb n="c56-0060__main__14"/>Martinher Motherwas a widow with <lb n="c56-0060__main__15"/>four childrenof whom <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12398">this</del> Justine <lb n="c56-0060__main__16"/>was the third. This girl had always been <lb n="c56-0060__main__17"/>the <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12406">favou</del> favourite of her father <lb n="c56-0060__main__18"/><mod sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12411"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12413">and</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0060.02"/><lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12422"/><sga-add eID="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12422"/>but <mdel>by</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12427"/>thro <sga-add eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12427"/><mod eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12411"/> an odd perversityher Mother <lb n="c56-0060__main__19"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12433">never</del> could <mod sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12437"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12439">bear</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12442"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12442"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12448"/>not endure <sga-add eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12448"/><mod eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12437"/> her andafter the <lb n="c56-0060__main__20"/>death of M. <mod sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12454"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12456">Martin</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12459"/>Moritz <sga-add eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12459"/><mod eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12454"/>treated her very ill. <lb n="c56-0060__main__21"/>My aunt observed this, andwhen Justine <lb n="c56-0060__main__22"/>was <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12467">ten</del> twelve years old tooprevailed <lb n="c56-0060__main__23"/>on her mother to allow her to live <lb n="c56-0060__main__24"/>at ourhouse. <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12477"/> <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0060.03">X</metamark> <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__1"/> <metamark function="displacement">X</metamark> <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__2"/>The republican <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__3"/>institutions of our <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__4"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12498">state</del> country,have <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__5"/>produced simpler <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__6"/>& happier manners <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__7"/>than those which <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__8"/>prevail in the <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__9"/>great monarchies <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__10"/>that surround it. <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__11"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12516">Ju Whilst</del> <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__12"/>Hence there <lb n="c56-0060__left_margin__13"/>is less <w ana="start"/>dis<anchor xml:id="c56-0060.04"/> tinction <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12534">s</del> <w ana="end"/>between the classes into which human beings have been divided,& the lower orders being neither so poor nor so despisedare more refined & moral. A servant atGeneva does not mean the same thing as a servant in France or England —Justine <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__left_margin__d5e12576"> <shi rend="underline">was</shi> </del>thus recieved intoour family to learnthe duties of a servant, whichin our fortunate countrydoes not include a <w ana="start"/>sacrifize<w ana="end"/>of the <w ana="start"/>dignity<w ana="end"/>of a human being. <anchor xml:id="c56-0061.02"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12477"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12618">Where</del> <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0060.05"/>she was taught <lb n="c56-0060__main__25"/>all the duties of servant & was very <lb n="c56-0060__main__26"/>kindly treated. <anchor xml:id="c56-0060.05"/> I dare say that you now <lb n="c56-0060__main__27"/>remember all about it, for Justine<lb n="c56-0060__main__28"/>was a great favourite of yours,& I <lb n="c56-0060__main__29"/><mod sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12637"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0060__main__d5e12639">remember</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0060__main__d5e12642"/>recollect<sga-add eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12642"/><mod eID="c56-0060__main__d5e12637"/>you once said, that<lb n="c56-0061__main__1"/>ifyou were <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0061__main__d5e12657">a</del> in an ill humour<lb n="c56-0061__main__2"/>one glance from Justine,could <w ana="start"/>dissi<lb n="c56-0061__main__3"/>pate<w ana="end"/> it <mod sID="c56-0061__main__d5e12669"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0061__main__d5e12671">from</del><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0061__main__d5e12674"/>for <sga-add eID="c56-0061__main__d5e12674"/><mod eID="c56-0061__main__d5e12669"/>the same reason <lb n="c56-0061__main__4"/>that Ariosto gaveconcerning the <lb n="c56-0061__main__5"/>beauty of Angelica:– shelooked so <lb n="c56-0061__main__6"/>frank heartedand happy. My Aunt <lb n="c56-0061__main__7"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0061__main__d5e12687">was very fond of her which</del> <del next="#c56-0061.05" rend="strikethrough" sID="c56-0061__main__d5e12759"/>This benefit <sga-add eID="c56-0061__main__d5e12759"/><mod eID="c56-0061__main__d5e12751"/>was fully <lb n="c56-0061__main__11"/>repaid; <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0061__main__d5e12765">for</del> Justine was the most <lb n="c56-0061__main__12"/>grateful little creature in the <lb n="c56-0061__main__13"/>world.I do not mean that she <lb n="c56-0061__main__14"/>made any professions–Inever <lb n="c56-0061__main__15"/>heard one pass her lips <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0061__main__d5e12777">w</del>but <lb n="c56-0061__main__16"/>you could see by her eyethat <lb n="c56-0061__main__17"/>she almost adored her protectress. <lb n="c56-0061__main__18"/>Although verygay, and in many respects <lb n="c56-0061__main__19"/>inconsiderate, yet she paid the greatest<lb n="c56-0061__main__20"/>attention to every gesture of my Aunt–<lb n="c56-0061__main__21"/>she thought her the <mod sID="c56-0061__main__d5e12793"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0061__main__d5e12795">miracle</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0061__main__d5e12798"/>model<sga-add n="c56-0061__main__24"/>ners<w ana="end"/>,so that <mod sID="c56-0061__main__d5e12829"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0061__main__d5e12831"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0061__main__d5e12841">very</del> often <mod sID="c56-0061__main__d5e12844"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0061__main__d5e12846">puts</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0061.03"/><lb n="c56-0061__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c56-0061__left_margin__d5e12855"/><sga-add eID="c56-0061__left_margin__d5e12855"/>reminds<mod eID="c56-0061__main__d5e12844"/><lb n="c56-0061__main__25"/>me <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0061__main__d5e12862">in mind</del>of her. <delSpan rend="vertical_line" spanTo="#c56-0061.07"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0061__main__d5e12867">You did not</del> observe <lb n="c56-0061__main__26"/>all this, nor did I at the time but <lb n="c56-0061__main__27"/>it struck me afterwards when I <lb n="c56-0061__main__28"/>reflected on the subject. <anchor xml:id="c56-0061.07"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0061__main__29"/>Whenmy dearest Aunt diedevery <lb n="c56-0061__main__30"/>one was too much occupied in their<lb n="c56-0062__main__1"/>own <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0062__main__d5e12895">grif</del>grief to notice poor Justine<lb n="c56-0062__main__2"/>who had attended her during her <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0062__main__d5e12900">whole</del> <lb n="c56-0062__main__3"/>illness with the greatestaffection. <lb n="c56-0062__main__4"/>Poor Justine was very illbut other <lb n="c56-0062__main__5"/>tryalswere reserved for her. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0062__main__6"/>Oneby oneher brothers & sister <lb n="c56-0062__main__7"/>had diedand her mother was now<lb n="c56-0062__main__8"/>with the exception of her neglected <lb n="c56-0062__main__9"/>daugher <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0062__main__d5e12921">was</del>left childless. The <lb n="c56-0062__main__10"/>conscience of the woman was troubled <lb n="c56-0062__main__11"/>andshe began to think that the <lb n="c56-0062__main__12"/>deaths of her favourites was a judgement <lb n="c56-0062__main__13"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0062__main__d5e12933"/>sent<sga-add eID="c56-0062__main__d5e12933"/>from heaven to <mod sID="c56-0062__main__d5e12936"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0062__main__d5e12938">punish</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0062__main__d5e12941"/>chastise<sga-add eID="c56-0062__main__d5e12941"/><mod eID="c56-0062__main__d5e12936"/>her partialli <mod sID="c56-0062__main__d5e12945"/> <mdel>n</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0062__main__d5e12949"/>t <sga-add eID="c56-0062__main__d5e12949"/><mod eID="c56-0062__main__d5e12945"/> y<lb n="c56-0062__main__14"/>she was a roman Catholicand I believe <lb n="c56-0062__main__15"/>her confessor encouragedthe idea <mod sID="c56-0062__main__d5e12957"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0062__main__d5e12959"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0062__main__d5e12959"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0062__main__d5e12965"/>which she had concieved. <sga-add eID="c56-0062__main__d5e12965"/><mod eID="c56-0062__main__d5e12957"/> . <w ana="start"/>Accor<lb n="c56-0062__main__16"/>dingly<w ana="end"/>,a few Months after your <w ana="start"/>depar<lb n="c56-0062__main__17"/>ture<w ana="end"/> for <mod sID="c56-0062__main__d5e12983"/> <mdel>i</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0062__main__d5e12987"/>I <sga-add eID="c56-0062__main__d5e12987"/><mod eID="c56-0062__main__d5e12983"/> ngolstadt, <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0062__main__d5e12991">sh</del>Justine was called <lb n="c56-0062__main__18"/>home by her repentant Mother. Poor <lb n="c56-0062__main__19"/>girlshe wept when she quitted our house<lb n="c56-0062__main__20"/>she was much altered since the death <lb n="c56-0062__main__21"/>of my aunt:grief had given soft <mod sID="c56-0062__main__d5e13003"/> <mdel>e</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0062__main__d5e13007"/>n <sga-add eID="c56-0062__main__d5e13007"/><mod eID="c56-0062__main__d5e13003"/> ess<lb n="c56-0062__main__22"/>and a winning mildness to her manners<lb n="c56-0062__main__23"/>which had before been remarkable <lb n="c56-0062__main__24"/>for vivacity. Nor <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0062__main__d5e13017">did</del> was her residence <lb n="c56-0062__main__25"/>at her Mothershouse of a nature to <lb n="c56-0062__main__26"/>restore her gaiety. The poor <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0062__main__d5e13025">fo</del> wo <lb n="c56-0062__main__27"/>manwas very vacillating in her <lb n="c56-0062__main__28"/>repentance. She sometimes begged <lb n="c56-0062__main__29"/>Justine to forgive her unkindness<lb n="c56-0063__main__1"/>butmuch oftenoraccused her <lb n="c56-0063__main__2"/>ashaving caused the deaths of <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0063__main__d5e13046">h</del> her <lb n="c56-0063__main__3"/>brothers & sister. Perpetual fretting <lb n="c56-0063__main__4"/>at lastthrew Mad. Martininto <lb n="c56-0063__main__5"/>a decline, which at first encreased<lb n="c56-0063__main__6"/>her irritability, but she is now at <lb n="c56-0063__main__7"/>rest for ever; <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0063__main__d5e13062">for</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0063__main__d5e13065"> <unclear>S</unclear> </del>she <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0063__main__d5e13071">did</del> died <lb n="c56-0063__main__8"/>on the first approach of coldat <lb n="c56-0063__main__9"/>the beginning of th <mod sID="c56-0063__main__d5e13078"/> <mdel>e</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0063__main__d5e13082"/>is <sga-add eID="c56-0063__main__d5e13082"/><mod eID="c56-0063__main__d5e13078"/><mod sID="c56-0063__main__d5e13086"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0063__main__d5e13088"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><sga-add eID="c56-0063__main__d5e13088"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0063__main__d5e13094"/>last <sga-add eID="c56-0063__main__d5e13094"/><mod eID="c56-0063__main__d5e13086"/> winter <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0063.01"/>that <lb n="c56-0063__main__10"/>has just passed <anchor xml:id="c56-0063.01"/>.Justine has <lb n="c56-0063__main__11"/>returned to usand I assure you <lb n="c56-0063__main__12"/>I love her tenderly. She is very clever <lb n="c56-0063__main__13"/>and extremely mild& pretty andas <lb n="c56-0063__main__14"/>I mentioned before <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0063__main__d5e13114">she</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0063__main__d5e13117">is</del>her <mod sID="c56-0063__main__d5e13120"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0063__main__d5e13122">air</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0063__main__d5e13125"/>mein <sga-add eID="c56-0063__main__d5e13125"/><mod eID="c56-0063__main__d5e13120"/>and <lb n="c56-0063__main__15"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0063.02"/><lb n="c56-0063__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c56-0063__left_margin__d5e13137"/>her <sga-add eID="c56-0063__left_margin__d5e13137"/>expressions <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0063__main__d5e13142">are</del> continually remind me <lb n="c56-0063__main__16"/>of my dear Aunt. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0063__main__17"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0063__main__d5e13151">And</del> Imust say a few words to <lb n="c56-0063__main__18"/>you also,My dear Victor,of little darling <lb n="c56-0063__main__19"/>William. I wish you could see him.He <lb n="c56-0063__main__20"/>is very tall of his agewith sweet laughing <lb n="c56-0063__main__21"/>blue eyes <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0063__main__d5e13163">and</del>dark eyelashesand curling <lb n="c56-0063__main__22"/>hairWhen he smilestwo little dimples <lb n="c56-0063__main__23"/>appear on his cheekswhich are rosy <lb n="c56-0063__main__24"/>with health — his chin comes down in <lb n="c56-0063__main__25"/>a beautiful oval <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0063__main__d5e13175">a</del> After this <w ana="start"/>descrip<lb n="c56-0063__main__26"/>tion<w ana="end"/> I can only say what our visitors <lb n="c56-0063__main__27"/>say a thousand times a day–'He is too <lb n="c56-0063__main__28"/>pretty for a boy'. <mod sID="c56-0063__main__d5e13189"/> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0063__main__d5e13191"/> <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0063.03">X</metamark><lb n="c56-0063__left_margin__1"/>He has already <lb n="c56-0063__left_margin__2"/>had one or two <lb n="c56-0063__left_margin__3"/>little <shi rend="underline">wives</shi><lb n="c56-0063__left_margin__4"/>but Louisa <lb n="c56-0063__left_margin__5"/> <mdel>M</mdel> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0063__left_margin__d5e13216"> <unclear>Caln</unclear> </del> Biron <lb n="c56-0063__left_margin__6"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0063__left_margin__d5e13223"/>is<sga-add eID="c56-0063__left_margin__d5e13223"/>his favourite–<lb n="c56-0063__left_margin__7"/>a pretty little <lb n="c56-0063__left_margin__8"/>girl of five years old <mdel>to</mdel> <anchor xml:id="c56-0063.04"/><sga-add eID="c56-0063__main__d5e13191"/><mod eID="c56-0063__main__d5e13189"/><milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0063__main__29"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0063__main__d5e13242">Miss Mansfeld</del> Now,dear VictorI dare<lb n="c56-0064__main__1"/>say <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0064__main__d5e13255">I</del>you wish to be indulged in a little <lb n="c56-0064__main__2"/>gossip about your acquaintance.The <lb n="c56-0064__main__3"/>pretty Miss Mansfeldhas already received <lb n="c56-0064__main__4"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0064__main__d5e13265">on</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0064__main__d5e13268">her</del> the congratulatory visits on her <lb n="c56-0064__main__5"/>approaching marriage with a young <lb n="c56-0064__main__6"/>Englishman, John <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0064__main__d5e13275">Mebourne</del> <w ana="start"/>Mel<lb n="c56-0064__main__7"/>bourne<w ana="end"/>Esq. Her ugly sister Manon<lb n="c56-0064__main__8"/>married M. Hoflandthe rich bankerlast <lb n="c56-0064__main__9"/>autumn. Your favourite schoolfellow<lb n="c56-0064__main__10"/>Louis Manoir <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0064__main__d5e13291">ma</del>has suffered several <lb n="c56-0064__main__11"/>misfortunes <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0064__main__d5e13297">d</del> since the departure <lb n="c56-0064__main__12"/>of Clerval from Geneva <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0064__main__d5e13302">b</del>But he <lb n="c56-0064__main__13"/>has <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0064__main__d5e13307">atready</del> already recovered his spirits<lb n="c56-0064__main__14"/>and hereported to <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0064__main__d5e13313">m</del> be on the point <lb n="c56-0064__main__15"/>of marrying a very lively pretty french <lb n="c56-0064__main__16"/>woman— Mad. Tavernier –Sheis a widow<lb n="c56-0064__main__17"/>and much older than Manoirbut <lb n="c56-0064__main__18"/>she is much <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0064__main__d5e13325">adv</del> admiredand a <lb n="c56-0064__main__19"/>favourite with every body.<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0064__main__20"/>Ihave written myself into good <w ana="start"/>spi<lb n="c56-0064__main__21"/>rits<w ana="end"/>,dear Cousin yet I can not conclude <lb n="c56-0064__main__22"/>without again anxiously enquiring <lb n="c56-0064__main__23"/>concerning your health— Dear Victor, if <lb n="c56-0064__main__24"/>you are not very ill write yourself <lb n="c56-0064__main__25"/>and make your father and all <lb n="c56-0064__main__26"/>of us happy or— I cannot bear to <anchor xml:id="c56-0064.01"/><lb n="c56-0064__left_margin__1"/>think <mod sID="c56-0064__left_margin__d5e13360"/> <mdel>of</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0064__left_margin__d5e13364"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0064__left_margin__d5e13364"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0064__left_margin__d5e13370"/>on <sga-add eID="c56-0064__left_margin__d5e13370"/><mod eID="c56-0064__left_margin__d5e13360"/> the <lb n="c56-0064__left_margin__2"/>other side <lb n="c56-0064__left_margin__3"/>of the question <lb n="c56-0064__left_margin__4"/>my tears <w ana="start"/>al<lb n="c56-0064__left_margin__5"/>ready<w ana="end"/> flow <anchor xml:id="c56-0064.02"/><lb n="c56-0064__main__27"/>Your very affectionate Cousin <lb n="c56-0064__main__28"/> <milestone next="#c56-0064.04" spanTo="#c56-0064.03" unit="tei:seg"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0064__main__d5e13396">dearrest</del> – dearest Victor <metamark function="separate">)</metamark> <anchor xml:id="c56-0064.03"/> Elizabeth Lavenza <lb n="c56-0064__main__29"/> <milestone spanTo="#c56-0064.05" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c56-0064.04"/> write– <anchor xml:id="c56-0064.05"/>
